attributes.action: desist from ill-conceived, headline grabbing legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increased 4x4 road tax does nothing to persuade drivers to use their vehicles less, and we don't all live in Chelsea.

Handgun legislation punished safe, responsible enthusiasts, whilst doing nothing to control the acceleration of gun crime.

The Dangerous Dogs Act did nothing to control irresponsible owners.

These, and many more stupid pieces of legislation...

When are we going to see an end to the mindless bureaucracy on which governments wastes their time and our money?
